title: Add scenario test infrastructure and first identity scenario test
description: Create agents/tests/scenarios/ directory with conftest.py and test_identity.py. The scenario test starts a BaseAgent, registers it against a live Identity service, then exercises get_agent_info, list_agents, and verify_signature. Requires the identity service running on localhost:8001. Add pytest mark @pytest.mark.scenario. Add just test-scenarios target to agents/justfile (runs pytest tests/scenarios/ -v -m scenario). Add just test-scenarios target to root justfile (delegates to cd agents && just test-scenarios). Scenario tests are NOT part of ci-quiet since they need live services.
close_reason: Scenario test infrastructure added. Identity scenario test passes against live service: register, re-register idempotent, get_agent_info, list_agents, verify_jws.

title: Implement CourtMixin: file_claim
description: Implement CourtMixin in agents/src/base_agent/mixins/court.py. Methods: file_claim(task_id, reason). @tool decorated, async, uses JWS signing.

title: Implement BankMixin: get_balance, get_transactions, lock_escrow
description: Implement the BankMixin class in agents/src/base_agent/mixins/bank.py. Methods: get_balance(), get_transactions(), lock_escrow(amount, task_id). All methods use JWS signing via self._sign_jws(). All decorated with @tool. All async.

title: Implement ReputationMixin: submit_feedback, get_agent_feedback, get_task_feedback
description: Implement ReputationMixin in agents/src/base_agent/mixins/reputation.py. Methods: submit_feedback(task_id, to_agent_id, category, rating, comment), get_agent_feedback(agent_id), get_task_feedback(task_id). All @tool decorated, all async.

title: Implement IdentityMixin: register, get_agent_info, list_agents, verify_signature
description: Implement the IdentityMixin class in agents/src/base_agent/mixins/identity.py. Methods: register() (idempotent - handles 409 by looking up existing agent_id), get_agent_info(agent_id), list_agents(), verify_signature(agent_id, payload, signature). All methods decorated with @tool for Strands compatibility. All async using httpx.
close_reason: Replaced by agent-economy-qy1 with more detailed description based on identity service spec review

title: Base agent scaffolding: project structure, config, signing, BaseAgent skeleton
description: Set up agents/ directory with config.yaml, roster.yaml, justfile, pyproject.toml. Implement config.py (Settings class using service-commons pattern), signing.py (Ed25519 key loading/generation/JWS creation), and BaseAgent skeleton class that composes all mixins, holds identity state, and provides _sign_jws/_auth_header/_request internals.
close_reason: Scaffolding complete: pyproject.toml, config.yaml, roster.yaml, justfile, BaseAgent with mixin stubs, signing utilities, config module, and 24 passing unit tests. CI green.

title: Implement TaskBoardMixin: full task lifecycle methods
description: Implement TaskBoardMixin in agents/src/base_agent/mixins/task_board.py. Methods: list_tasks(status?), get_task(task_id), create_task(title, spec, reward, deadlines), cancel_task(task_id), submit_bid(task_id, proposal), list_bids(task_id), accept_bid(task_id, bid_id), upload_asset(task_id, file_path), submit_deliverable(task_id), approve_task(task_id), dispute_task(task_id, reason). All @tool decorated, all async, all use JWS signing where required.

title: Implement IdentityMixin: register, get_agent_info, list_agents, verify_signature
description: Implement client methods in agents/src/base_agent/mixins/identity.py that call the Identity service API (port 8001). Methods: register() - POST /agents/register with name and public_key, idempotent (409 means already registered, look up agent_id). get_agent_info(agent_id) - GET /agents/{agent_id}. list_agents() - GET /agents. verify_signature(agent_id, token) - POST /agents/verify. All methods use self._request() / self._request_raw() from BaseAgent and self.config.platform.identity_url for the base URL. Add unit tests in agents/tests/unit/test_identity_mixin.py.
close_reason: IdentityMixin implemented with register, get_agent_info, list_agents, verify_jws. 6 unit tests. CI green.
